testcase.name: checking Amazon search box functionality using valid products name
testcase.system-out: Given user is landed on amazon homepage.....................................passed And user should be able to enter valid "Bluetooth earbuds"..................passed And user should be able to click on search button...........................passed And user should be able to click on Free Shipping by Amazon.................passed And user should be able to enter Minimum price in price edit field..........passed And user should be able to enter Maximum price in price edit field..........passed When users should be able to click on Go button.............................passed Then users should able to see "Bluetooth earbuds" displayed.................passed
